DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare taste acceptability Zyrtec syrup desloratadine syrup child . Children 6 11 year age receive 5 mL syrup , separate 15 20 minute single day .
DOC.brief_title: Taste Test Between Desloratadine Cetirizine Syrup Children ( Study P03826 )
DOC.criteria: Subjects must : Between 6 11 year age good general health Premenarcheal female Subjects : Have know allergy sensitivity either drug formulation Have medical condition may interfere subject 's ability discriminate taste Have use antihistamine within 24 hour prior dose Were take sedative , tranquilizer , monoamine oxidase inhibitor drug Were involve another clinical market research study within past 30 day
